name: books-project
description: service      1 create beeper gets a beeper and add it to the db     2 get all beepers      3 get beeper by id gets id as string and send the beeper     4 update beeper, change the beeper status     5 delete beeper, gets id and delete the beeper     6 get beeper by status, filter all the beepers and return the beeper that the status == status     7 add location to beeper if the beeper is in status ...
